checkIn.print: You: How may I help you today?
???: This place is very very very nice!
You: Unfortunately, I can’t give you that room.
You: It’s the current staff’s residency room.
Dimitri: I like. Very very much!
Dimitri: Dimitri will play triple the doubloon!!
You: Guess I’ll be sleeping in the broom closet...

toaster.print: -- Dimitri walks out of his room grinning. --
Dimitri: Ah, I believe I have ze BEST room in the house.
Dimitri: Howeva, Dimitri would like it verrry much if you give me blanket and toaster.
Dimitri: Dimitri wants to be niiiiiice and toasty at the dark time.
